trans-unit.source: Creates a new verb to be used with the designer using the associated verb group, text and event handler.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo verbo a ser usado com o designer usando o manipulador de eventos, o texto e o grupo de verbos associados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> describes an action to take against a workflow component.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> descreve uma ação a ser tomada em relação a um componente de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> options are displayed in the menu bar and right-click context menus during design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> opções são exibidas na barra de menus e menus de contexto de atalho durante o tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> will be grouped with other verbs associated with the same <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> and are displayed in the corresponding sub-menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> serão agrupados com outros verbos associados ao mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> e são exibidos no submenu correspondente em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The event handler passed when creating a new verb will be invoked when this verb is chosen from the menu.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos passados quando criar um novo verbo será invocado quando esse verbo é escolhido no menu.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to associate with the new verb.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser associado ao novo verbo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> in which the new verb belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> ao qual o novo verbo pertence.

trans-unit.source: The description of the verb to show on the menu.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do verbo a ser mostrado no menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> that will handle the menu selection event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> que manipulará o evento de seleção de menu.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> by using an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> value, a description of the verb, and an <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> usando um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, um valor <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" />, uma descrição do verbo e um <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="text" /> is empty or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="text" /> está vazio ou é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeHandler" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeHandler" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> in which this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> ao qual este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> pertence.

trans-unit.source: The description of the verb to show on the menu.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do verbo a ser mostrado no menu.

trans-unit.source: The event handler that handles the menu selection event.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos que manipula o evento de seleção de menu.

trans-unit.source: The event handler that handles status updates.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos que manipula as atualizações de status.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> by using an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> value, a description of the verb, and two <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> objects, one to handle menu selection events and the other to handle status updates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> usando um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, um valor <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" />, uma descrição do verbo e dois objetos <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />, um para manipular os eventos de seleção de menu e outro para manipular as atualizações de status.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma nova <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb.CommandID" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb.CommandID" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> is useful for placing items on a menu bar or context menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> é útil para colocar itens em uma barra de menus ou contexto de menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> to associate verbs together on a menu bar or context menu.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> para associar os verbos juntos em uma barra de menu ou contexto de menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets an integer that describes the status of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um inteiro que descreve o status do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="int" /> that describes the <see langword="OleStatus" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="int" /> que descreve o <see langword="OleStatus" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: The `OleStatus` contains a mixture of flags that reflect the state of this menu item.
trans-unit.target: O `OleStatus` contém uma mistura de sinalizadores que refletem o estado do item de menu.
